entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 05 February 2023
